character.name: Professor
character.desc: Your professor. They will teach you how to write your own character, as well as the power of <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c>.

knowledge.name: Knowledge
knowledge.desc: Base limit of 3. When reaching the limit, spend the required <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> to gain 1 <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c> and 1 <c=status>LESSON</c>. Excess <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> is not lost.
